channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - July 24, 2020
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-july-24-2020) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
This week's roundup includes the first set of videos from last weekend's Gauntlet Community Open Gaming (GCOG) event! Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players, both from the Gauntlet Calendar events and from GCOG. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
